NAME: Shashank Gupta, FMVA®, MBA, B.E.
ABOUT:
	MBA Finance & B.E with an experience 9 years in Financial Planning, Analysis & Reporting and business analytics. 
	Previously worked with Genpact India, responsible for Revenue & Cost analysis and reporting for Chocolate & Refreshment Beverages business of Mondelez International Plc for UK & Ireland.
	Previously worked with JP Morgan Chase Bank & TCS.
	Experience in Capital market (Financial Reporting), related to Fixed Income & Equity products.
	Gained experience in financial planning, analysis & reporting, variance analysis & reporting, forecasting, MIS reporting, building complex business models, process optimization.
	Strong communication, interpersonal, analytical & team building skills, with proficiency at grasping new concepts quickly and utilizing the same in a productive manner
	Stakeholder management with an ability to understand the requirements of onshore partner & assist the team in maintaining the existing reporting procedures, tools and workflows necessary to facilitate the reporting process
